text:
OpenPhone | Backend & infrastructure, Mobile (iOS/Android) | San Francisco | $120k-$160k | Full-time | ONSITE | https://angel.co/openphone/jobs

We are a recent YC graduate company looking to build our founding engineering team. If you are an experienced engineer who's looking to have a big impact, want to solve challenging problems and work on a product that users love and depend on, apply now!
